detail_desc: Trousers in a pleated weave with a high, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets, elasticated cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Wrap dress in a printed weave with a deep V-neck, a seam at the waist with narrow ties and long, wide sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs. Asymmetric skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with ribbing at the top, a wide V-neck front and back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with an embroidered motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton canvas with a high waist, zip fly, patch front pockets, fake flap back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Printed sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, wrapover funnel collar, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Cap in a cotton weave with elastication at the back.
T-shirt in printed slub-cotton jersey with an open chest pocket and ribbed neckline.
Tall boots in imitation suede with gently rounded toes and covered heels. Jersey linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel approx. 6.5 cm.

Suit trousers in marled Italian wool with stitching details. Concealed button and hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.
Knee-length skirt with decorative buttons. Concealed zip at the back.
Knee-length skirt in sturdy satin with a high waist, pleats and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted cold shoulder top in cotton jersey with drawstrings at the shoulders, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a lace trim at the top, low waist, ties at the sides and gathers at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Large shoulder bag in nylon with a metallic coating. Zip at the top, an outer compartment with an elasticated drawstring, a zipped inner compartment and an adjustable strap. Lined. Height 28 cm. Width 51.5 cm.
Soft slippers with elastication around the top, fabric linings and insoles and imitation suede soles.
Hi-tops with elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a fold-up hem.
Bikini top with lined cups, removable inserts and narrow shoulder straps that tie at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a double-layered, wrapover hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.

Small shoulder bag in imitation suede and imitation leather with a metal chain shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic fastener, one inner compartment and one outer compartment. Lined. Size 5x15.5x20 cm.
Sandals with narrow straps at the front and a heel strap. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, double-layered flutter sleeves and a gathered yoke.

Skirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with covered elastication at the back of the waist and a decorative bow at the front. Sewn-in wrapover at the front and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Top in an airy, crinkled weave with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and jersey trims at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in a patterned cotton weave with a small frilled collar, buttons and pin-tucks at the top and detachable ties under the bust. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with worn details in a loose fit. High waist, low crotch, button fly and straight legs.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck, low-cut back and narrow shoulder straps. Unlined.
Short, high-waisted skirt in a textured jacquard weave with a pleat at the front, pockets in the side seams and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Bikers in jersey made from a cotton blend with a high waist, lined gusset and laser-cut edges at the hems. Light sculpting effect on the tummy, bum and thighs.

Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave. Small stand-up collar with gathers all round, buttons down the front and short sleeves. Concealed pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
High-waisted, fitted skirt.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Short, fitted dress in organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline and short sleeves.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
Calf-length jersey dress with dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Block-coloured pleated section at the hem. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Hairbands in an organic cotton weave with a bow.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Dress in woven fabric with a lace top, scallop-edged cap sleeves and low-cut back with pearly buttons. Seam at the waist and a skirt in a double layer of tulle. Lined.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Hat in soft, rib-knit wool.
Fitted jumper in a ribbed viscose blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves.

Soft, non-wired push-up bra in ribbed microfibre with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide hem and no fasteners. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket.

Top in sheer mesh with an embroidered floral pattern, gathered V-neck at the front and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, gathered sleeves with trims and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt jacket in a soft viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, dropped shoulders and 3/4-length, flounced sleeves. Unlined.
Cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs with creases.
Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.

Calf-length dress in a linen and cotton weave with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Buttons down the front, smocking at the back and a gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a lightly brushed finish. Straight, relaxed fit with dropped shoulders.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Bomber jacket in nylon with a slight sheen. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front, gently dropped shoulder seams and long sleeves. Diagonal front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Lace thong briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Fitted, gathered top in jersey with a V-neck, vertical seams down the front and back and long sleeves.

Sleeveless dress in tulle with a bodice covered in shimmering sequins. Narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps, a zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a skirt in several tiers of pleated flounces to create width. Lined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Slides with a wide strap over the foot and imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel approx. 1 cm.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with long sleeves.

Short dress in airy plumeti chiffon with a wide drawstring neckline and long raglan sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Partly lined in jersey.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, two-way zip down the front and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Zipped sleeve pocket, side pockets with a concealed press-stud and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Short jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Long sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs and a cut-off, frayed hem.

Set with a hooded top and matching leggings in soft fabric. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a raw-edge hem. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a V-neck and open front with ties. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
